results.name: Numerator of Hermite(n, 5/27).
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..376
mathematica: Numerator[Table[HermiteH[n, 5/27], {n, 0, 30}]] (* or *) Table[27^n* HermiteH[n, 5/27], {n,0,30}] (* _G. C. Greubel_, Jul 12 2018 *)
program: (MAGMA) [Numerator((&+[(-1)^k*Factorial(n)*(10/27)^(n-2*k)/( Factorial(k) *Factorial(n-2*k)): k in [0..Floor(n/2)]])): n in [0..30]]; // _G. C. Greubel_, Jul 12 2018
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Nov 12 2009
